item.title: Why the new interoperability rules dont yet mean the death of the fax machine
item.description: And of course, every individual interaction with the healthcare system touches lots of different data repositories, few of which are integrated: Read on travismay.medium.com

item.title: We Are the Ever Given
item.description: Due to good luck, good science, or Operation Warp Speed, we now have several very effective vaccines. Despite that, scoring an appointment to get one has often seemed like The Hunger Games, and, even when we got one, there was no systemic way to track who received which type when. Read on kimbellard.medium.com
